text: Reform School Girl is a 1957 movie directed by Edward Bernds. It was produced by American International Pictures (AIP) and distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. It stars Gloria Castillo, Ross Ford, and Edd Byrnes. The movie is about a young woman who is sent to reform school after she refuses to disclose what she knows about a traffic accident in which a pedestrian was killed. It was remade in 1994 with the same title. Category:Movies directed by Edward Bernds Category:1950s English-language movies Category:Movies produced by American International Pictures Category:1957 crime drama movies
title: Reform School Girl
